finger-tapping_taps.description: a progressive number indicating the tap, e.g. 1 for 1st tap, 50 for 50th tap, within a trial_type

finger-tapping_corr.description: placeholder column. do not use this column for scoring

finger-tapping_RT.description: onset of each tap with respect to 0ms start of the trial_type (progressive)

trial_type.description: trial type: dominant or non-dominant hand, and a progressive number indicating the order of that trial within-type.
